result.execSummary:
Gary D. PERKINS Sr. was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Gary D. PERKINS Sr. was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gary D. PERKINS Sr.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
The Court explains to the defendant that he is wanted in the State of Kansas for a probation violation.  The defendant understands this.
The defendant waives his right to counsel. He does not qualify for the public defender. 
 The defendant requests bond and to be able to turn himself into Kansas on his own.  He claims the agent knew he was moving and had his address here in Wisconsin.
The State feels any bail to be set should be determined by Kansas authorities.
The defendant signs all copies of the waiver of extradition.
The Court signs all copies of the waiver of extradition.
Copies delivered to DA, jail, State of Kansas, defendant and copy mailed to the governors office.
Waiver of Extradition.
Minutes.
